!Master Selsia: Ah, you seem to have some common sense. Perhaps I was right about you. Our investigation has revealed that the Human official and the Priest were delivering some secret documents or a report concerning our race to someone in Oren Castle. Apparently someone else who did not want that to happen made careful preparations and launched this ambush. [Quest _066_CertifiedArbalester 32220-08.htm|"I see."]
